languages.english-overview:
MochiKit is a highly documented and well tested, suite of JavaScript libraries that will help you get shit done, fast. We took all the good ideas we could find from our Python, Objective-C, etc. experience and adapted it to the crazy world of JavaScript.
MochiKit is a dual-licensed software available under the MIT License, or the Academic Free License, v2.1.
languages.english-features:
Lightweight
Modular
Object-Oriented JavaScript framework
Cross-browser code
Well Documented
Browser Compatibility
All of the modern and popular browsers: Safari 2.0.2, Firefox 1.0.7, Firefox 1.5b2, Internet Explorer 6, and Opera 8.5. Other JavaScript platforms should work if they're standards compliant
